name: An Unexpected Encounter
desc:
An abnormality with the Metaverse Navigator sent the Phantom Thieves to a strange castle.
As they continued in a daze, they faced an unexpected encounter.

name: Run
desc:
The Phantom Thieves encountered two unfamiliar Thieves, Mona and Skull, and established an alliance with them.
Skull had been to this castle before, but it didn't seem like it had been a positive experience for him.

name: Tasteless Castle
desc:
The Phantom Thieves continued pushing forward and exploring the area.
The interior of the castle could hardly be described as being in good taste.

name: Raucous Teammates
desc:
Compared to Kiuchi's Palace, the castle is filled with dark corridors and disturbing rooms.
Closer seems to feel uncomfortable here...

name: Prison Break
desc:
Working together to beat back the Shadows, the Phantom Thieves fought their way to the underground prison.
There, they came across a lost teammate confined to a cell.

name: Person with Good Taste
desc:
Panther joined her allies and the search for the Core continued.
Their final missing teammate, Joker, is still missing. Just where could he be?

name: Unpleasant Memories
desc:
The Phantom Thieves backtracked to a certain room at the castle's west end.
Panther seemed to have some bad memories of that room.

name: For Friends
desc:
In an area called the Training Hall of Love, the Phantom Thieves witnessed the unfair treatment of a cognitive being.
While there, Closer spotted a familiar face.

name: Treasured Cards
desc:
The Phantom Thieves find themselves in dire straits as they are suddenly attacked by a strong Shadow.
Luckily, they still had an ace up their sleeve.

name: Thieves' Alliance
desc:
With Joker's return, all allies had finally assembled.
The Phantom Thieves set out once more in pursuit of the Core.

name: Past Wisdom
desc:
Countless traps await the Phantom Thieves on their path to the Core.
They must combine their power in order to overcome the difficulties that lie ahead.

name: Temporary Rest
desc: The Phantom Thieves, exhausted from the continuous campaign of battles and exploration, decide they might need to take a short rest.

name: The Last Challenge
desc:
After their rest, the Phantom Thieves began a search for the third ball.
Although they hoped for a quick job, things didn't appear to be that simple.

name: It's Ours!
desc:
The Phantom Thieves have finally arrived at the heart of the castle.
Can they successfully steal the Core...?

name: Reunion
desc: The Metaverse Navigator has produced another anomaly. This time, the Thieves have been taken to a place resembling some sort of museum... will they encounter "them" again?

name: One More Core?
desc: After entering the museum, the Phantom Thieves encountered Panther and Fox. It seems that once again, they have been separated from their teammates. In exchange for searching for each other's lost allies, the two groups of Thieves entered into an alliance. During this time, Lufel seemed to grow curious about something.

name: Determination to Resist
desc: During the search for their teammates, Fox turned his attention to a painting hung on the wall of the museum. This place seems to resemble a certain Palace, one with which he and the owner shared a deep connection.

name: Find the Password!
desc: The Phantom Thieves head toward the second exhibition room. The museum's inner security seems to be very tight...

name: A Calm, Yet Forceful Entry
desc: The Phantom Thieves continue their search for the Core as they slip past various security measures. What awaited them ahead was...

name: Proceed Even Deeper
desc: Although the Thieves successfully acquired the Core, there seems to be one more Core reading left. In order to obtain the remaining Core, the Phantom Thieves ventured further within the museum.

name: Catch Me If You Can
desc: The Phantom Thieves head toward the security room in order to find the road leading outside of the art museum. The patrolling Shadows and security measures are not to be taken lightly.

name: Beauty Is Bizarre
desc: Just as the Phantom Thieves were about to reach the museum exit, an unexpected obstacle blocked their path. Can they put their heads together to overcome this unanticipated challenge?

name: Run Through!
desc: The Core's presence is rapidly growing closer. The exit is within reach.

name: Which is Real?
desc: The Phantom Thieves finally left the museum. There, they came across something most unexpected...

name: Queen Takes the Stage
desc:
The Thieves arrived at a building closely resembling Kaneshiro's Palace. No one could hide their disgust at the unsightly scene brimming with greed.
In front of the palace, they found the formerly lost Closer, who was accompanied by another reliable new teammate.
victoryText: Go to the bank hall control room

name: Continued Delusion
desc:
A flurry of banknotes was scattered all throughout the Palace.
If only it was all real... Each of the Thieves imagined the limitless possibilities.

name: Head for the Underground
desc:
The Core must be hidden somewhere within the bank's underground.
The Phantom Thieves continue searching the depths for a route forward.

name: Underground Search
desc:
Aside from patrolling Shadows, various tricks and traps hindered the Thieves' path.
To obtain the Core, their only option was to persevere and continue onward.
victoryText: Investigate the east side of the employee passage

name: Guidance Through the Screen
desc:
As Shadows close in, the Phantom Thieves find themselves in a dire position.
However, their luck turns around thanks to an unexpected visitor.
victoryText: Head to the employee passage control room

name: Aim for The Vault!
desc:
Facing greater dangers, the Phantom Thieves continue the exploration.
The next destination has been decided: the underground vault.
victoryText: Head to the laundering office lower floor

name: With All Our Effort
desc:
The Phantom Thieves have arrived in front of the vault.
Skull suggested holding a planning meeting before attempting to enter.

name: Vault Exploration
desc:
The exploration of the vault has begun.
In addition to traps and tricks, powerful Shadows lie in wait for the Phantom Thieves.

name: Continue: Vault Exploration
desc:
The presence of the Core grows closer.
It looks like the final destination of this journey will lead to the very heart of the vault.

name: The Final Battle
desc:
After great tribulation, the Phantom Thieves have finally arrived at the Core.
Can they defeat the perilous final Shadow that awaits, and steal the resplendent Core?

name: Girl in the Desert
desc:
Due to a Metaverse Navigator error, the Thieves once again appeared in an unexpected place.
While standing in bewilderment at the vast desert wasteland before them, they heard a voice calling for help.
victoryText: Find the source of the distress call

name: The Third Alliance
desc:
While traversing the desert with Oracle, the Phantom Thieves arrived at a pyramid, where they once again encountered Queen and Fox.
While delighted at the reunion, it seems other allies are still unaccounted for.

name: Shade and Sun
desc:
As the Phantom Thieves continued into the pyramid's underground area, they came across Panther and Skull.
However, upon seeing the joyous reunion between Closer and Panther, Oracle suddenly felt pain...

name: Into the Pyramid
desc:
In the Chamber of Rejection, it seems that not just enemies, but traps and gimmicks, lie in wait for the Thieves.
Sharp wits, in addition to raw strength, will be required in order to push forward.

name: Mural: Snake
desc:
As the Phantom Thieves continue inward, they encounter a strange mural of a snake.
It seems the mural in the original Palace was different, but what could that mean...

name: Mural: Chicken
desc:
Continuing from the snake, the Thieves happen upon a mural of a chicken.
While pondering its meaning, a portion of Oracle's past is brought to light.

name: Hidden Path
desc:
Facing stronger enemies as they continue inward, the present path grows dangerous.
The Thieves must find the right path, all while fending off Shadows.

name: Mural: Pig
desc:
The Phantom Thieves come across yet another peculiar mural.
At first glance, the animals in it didn't seem to be connected at all... But then, a look of realization appeared on Oracle's face.

name: The Final Stretch
desc:
As the Core's presence grows stronger, large numbers of traps and gimmicks hinder the path ahead.
Can the Thieves unite to overcome these obstacles?

name: Bring it Down!
desc:
After overcoming many trials, the Phantom Thieves have finally arrived at the Core.
Waiting for them was an enormous enemy far beyond their expectations.

name: Beauty Thief Takes the Stage!
desc:
As the members of the Phantom Thieves gathered, they had no trouble mingling with one another.
The newly-joined Noir seemed a little bit nervous at the current situation. After seeing her disposition, Joker took action...

name: Explore the Spaceport
desc: The structure of the spaceportesque False Palace was complex, teeming with various obstacles to the Phantom Thieves' exploration. Channeling all of the knowledge and experience they had gained up to this point, they utilized the facilities within the spaceport and slowly began to make their way through.

name: Continue: Explore the Spaceport
desc: As the Phantom Thieves began to acclimate to exploration, more and more Shadows stood in their path. Fighting useless battles is a waste of time and energy. Sharp situational judgment will be the key to success.

name: Mechanical Slave
desc:
Noir's mood darkened when she looked upon the robots forced to work like slaves.
Wind, who had experienced similar circumstances, empathized with Noir.
Despite it all, the two now have each other, as well as close allies, to support them along the way.

name: Pitiful Class Hierarchy
desc:
The Thieves find themselves hampered by the base's security system.
They need to find a shadow with an Employee ID bearing special access permissions. Even for Shadows of the Metaverse, it seems the shackles of hierarchical society cannot be so easily broken.

name: That's Wrong, Isn't It?
desc: By pure coincidence, the two groups of Phantom Thieves noticed a difference between their respective realities. They were perplexed by the possibility of the existence of parallel worlds...

name: An Entangled World
desc:
Oracle's mind returned to the parallel worlds situation.
Was the meeting of the two groups of Thieves really a product of coincidence? Who could have intentionally set up such an encounter? It seems that they may need to shed light on the truth themselves.

name: Fly to Space!
desc:
A vast vacuum of space surrounded the False Palace.
The only way to the Core was directly across the dark void. Even the Phantom Thieves couldn't help but feel a touch of uneasiness at the prospect.

name: Head to the Depths
desc:
After leaping through space, the Phantom Thieves arrived at the final area.
The location of the Core is only a small step away. Although they were greeted by powerful Shadows and all manner of obstacles, they continued their advance toward their goal.

name: Savior
desc:
The Phantom Thieves face off against the Core's guardian at the spaceport's deepest point.
In the middle of the battle, the enemy shouted all manner of mysterious words.
Just what could these utterances mean...
